column5: Planning a trip to simcoe with some buddies and looking at outfitters who head out of jackson's point and beaverton.  Any recommendations on which area is better? (trout/whitefish).
Once again, I'll tell you Tim Hales!!!!

Hi Sinker,  iv'e seen Floyd Hales here>>    http://www.floydhalesfishhuts.com/  Would this be the same outfitter?  I'm looking into going there next weekend,with over 40 yrs in the business i'm hoping he can put us on some fish?  cheers Streamerguy

Nope, Floyd Hale doesn't run the operation anymore. Its not even a Hale that runs it if I remember right.  Try here:  Tim Hales Fish Huts, 705-426-9669, RR#3, Conc. 7, Beaverton, Ontario. L0K 1A0  He's got some great huts, and nice machines to get out and back. I've always caught fish with him, everytime I've gone out.  Sinker
Thanx for the information guys  Did not want to end up with a snowfari adventure outfitter    Streamerguy
Booked a day with Tim Hales for Feb 6th.Taking my to sons age 8 and 6.By the sounds of things we should have a blast.
